entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as someone who failed dismally and is being talked to by Hermione about elf rights.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry's mood is lifted when he thinks about his father not being a prefect.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is rhapsodizing about his new broom.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is talking earnestly to Lupin about elf rights.

entities.name: comet two ninety
entities.description: The Comet Two Ninety is mentioned as a broomstick that can only go up to sixty with a decent tailwind.

relationships.description: Harry and Lupin are having a conversation.
Hermione and Lupin are having a conversation about elf rights.
Ron owns the Comet Two Ninety broomstick.
